surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

sentences.english: Is Taipei Songshan a suitable airport for cross-strait direct flight?
sentences.chinese: 台北松山机场是否适合成为两岸的直航机场？

sentences.english: Daily charter flights will be fully implemented in the next ten days.
sentences.chinese: 在接下来的十天里每天都会有包机进行直航飞行。

sentences.english: Two more direct cross-Strait cargo routes will also be added.
sentences.chinese: 两岸间还将增开两条直航货运线路。

sentences.english: It is understood that the direct and Zhangjiajie in Wuhan, the one-way only 45 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 据了解，此次武汉与张家界直航后，单程仅45分钟。

sentences.english: Since its opening, Shantou-Taiwan direct sea freight route has maintained the momentum of rapid development.
sentences.chinese: 汕台海上货运直航开通以来，保持了快速发展势头。

sentences.english: Indeed, Chinese airlines are starting direct flights to several African destinations.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，中国的航空公司开始往几个非洲目的地直航。

definition: scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
connected by air, sea traffic or service
(of an airline) to run a flight
a port for external trade/a trading or transit post on border between countries
